property.code:
{{velocity output="false"}} #macro(displayModal $id $diagram) {{html clean="false"}}
$services.localization.render('gliffy.diagram.modal.title')
$services.localization.render('gliffy.diagram.modal.text')
{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Confluence.Macros.Gliffy')) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Confluence.Macros.Gliffy')) ## Macro parameters #set($diagramName = $wikimacro.parameters.get('name')) ## "Constants" #set($previewImageName = "${diagramName}.png") #set($previewImage = $doc.getAttachment($previewImageName)) ## Variables #set($displayDiagram = true) #set($diagram = $NULL) ## ## Check if the diagram page exists #set($docReferenceSerialized = $services.model.serialize($doc.documentReference, 'local')) #set($diagrams = $services.query.xwql('from doc.object(Confluence.Macros.GliffyClass) as gliffyObj where gliffyObj.page = :page and gliffyObj.diagramName = :diagramName').bindValue('page', $docReferenceSerialized).bindValue('diagramName', $diagramName).setLimit(1).execute()) #if($diagrams.size() > 0) #set($diagram = $diagrams.get(0)) #end ## (% class="gliffy-diagram-contaier" %)((( ## The diagram exists -> display it #if($displayDiagram && $diagram) {{diagram reference="$diagram" cached="false" /}} #if($diagram && $xcontext.action != 'export') ## ## If Display a button allowing the user to go back to gliffy mode #if ($services.security.authorization.hasAccess('delete', $diagram)) #set($id = $mathtool.random(1, 100000)) $services.localization.render('gliffy.diagram.delete') {{html clean="false"}} $services.localization.render('gliffy.diagram.delete.link') {{/html}} #displayModal($id $diagram) #end #end #else #set($displayDiagram = false) #end ## Display the preview image if it exists #if($previewImage && !$displayDiagram) (% class="thumbnail" %)((( [[image:${previewImageName}]] ## ## If Display a button allowing the user to create an XWiki diagram #if ($services.security.authorization.hasAccess('edit', $doc.documentReference) && $xcontext.action != 'export') (% class="caption" %)((( $services.localization.render('gliffy.diagram.create') {{html clean=false}}
{{/html}} ))) ))) #end #end ))) {{/velocity}}

property.description: Bridge between the Confluence Gliffy macro and the XWiki Diagram macro. By default it displays the PNG file used by Gliffy to preview the diagram. The user has the option to convert the Gliffy diagram into an XWiki Diagram for being able to modify it.
